text: @NYGovCuomo I thought the rioters defeated coronavirus? Did I miss something? We arrested moms going to the beach, surfers at the beach, hairdressers who cut hair, but we allow rioters to burn buildings, loot business’s and murder retired police officers. Sounds like the liberal thing to do.
